document_data.name: Plagg
document_data.mainbody: Warrior '''Plagg''' was a devoted [[Cult of the Absolute|cultist]] of [[the Absolute]] who dwelled within the [[Shattered Sanctum]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Possessions: He wore a suit of [[goblin]]-made [[plate mail]] armor and bore a [[greataxe]] in battle.
document_data.History:
In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Plagg and other members of the Absolute's cult raided the nearby inn known as [[Waukeen's Rest]]. There they killed many [[Flaming Fist]] soldiers, and made off with some captives they marched off towards [[Moonrise Towers]].

After the raid, Plagg, [[Nik-Nuk]], and [[Crub]] played a favored game among the Absolute's goblin followers: fantasize how they would torture and kill someone.
